transcript: Sure, everybody's told the same story. It keeps us so excited. It keeps us coming back for more. It keeps us thinking that life is gonna start any second now if we could just find the right spot and get in on the action.

segments.text: Sure, everybody's told the same story. It keeps us so excited. It keeps us coming back for more.
It keeps us thinking that life is gonna start any second now if we could just find the right spot and get in on the action.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Sure, everybody's told the same story.  It keeps us all excited.  It keeps us coming back for more.  It keeps us thinking that life is gonna start any second now if we could just find the right spot and get in on the action.
